views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11 and 12.

More Camera Features!

INCLUDES:
-Portrait Lighting for the iPhone 7+
-Disable Live Photos
-Live Photos for unsupported devices
-Disable photos Thumbnail
-Hide Photos Thumbnail (Replaces with gray box)
-Disable Square mode
-Clear Camera Bars
-Clean Shutter Button
-Haptic Feedback
-Rear Cam As Default
-Disable Portrait Mode

*more to be added soon

Configure options from Settings.

-Added Depth Control for the iP7+, iP8+, and iPX (iOS 12 ONLY) -Fixed a bug where turning on an option in preferences would disable that option reorganized preferences
removed Haptic Feedback as it was causing issues for some users (or just not working)
